title: Derivative Interpretation Selector
description: Interactive visualization showing the derivative as both slope (graphical) and rate of change (contextual). Demonstrates that the derivative is a single mathematical concept with multiple real-world interpretations including velocity, growth rate, and marginal cost.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Calculus
Derivatives
Rate of Change
Slope
Tangent Lines
learningObjective: Students will interpret the derivative both as slope and as rate of change in context
